name: Release Notes
description: Generate release notes for a product update
prompt_text:
Generate clear and well-structured release notes for version {release_version}, classified as a {release_type}. The release notes should be written for a {audience} audience, adjusting the level of technical detail accordingly. Open with a brief summary of what this release delivers and why it matters to users.

Include the following changes:
{changes_summary}

Organize the notes into logical sections such as New Features, Improvements, Bug Fixes, and Breaking Changes (if applicable). Each entry should describe the change, the user-facing impact, and any action required by the user. For technical audiences, include relevant API changes or migration notes. For non-technical audiences, focus on outcomes and benefits rather than implementation details. End with any known issues or limitations.

variables.name: changes_summary
variables.label: Changes Summary
variables.placeholder: List the changes in this release
